thread.title: In new movie, a flawed Steve Jobs is forced to evolve
thread.title_full: In new movie, a flawed Steve Jobs is forced to evolve - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Thomas Lee
title: In new movie, a flawed Steve Jobs is forced to evolve
text:
Michael Fassbender is the title character in “Steve Jobs.” Michael Fassbender is the title character in “Steve Jobs.”
As perhaps the biggest champion of closed, proprietary systems, Steve Jobs the man would have appreciated the scene at a recent screening at the Castro Theatre of “Steve Jobs,” the movie.
